name: anomalous3
text: Lucifer has nifty hair. And I want his telephone. So classy.

name: lawbot
text: Also, his manner of drafting contracts amounts to two fingers to earthly lawyers and their practices.

name: greyfield
text: And he always speaks in italic text. Nifty.

name: anomalous3
text: I just realized, in light of present circumstances, tha I am among the few and the proud to make a first post and not fuck it up (too bad)

name: anomalous3
text: lame to myself for misspelling "that"

name: ih8jonmayr
text: Wow! Somebody actually atoned for shitty grammar on the internet! That's a first.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, Connellingus, Saint)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by HonestTom, farqussus, godfatherofsouls, Zem)

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by SSDDR, farqussus, Gumfish, cdl146, Madoushi, slalvation)

name: i_love_kate
text: Why the hell does this have more chubbies than the quite pertinent comment above?

name: fineoakstructure
text: Because a lot of people didn't like Saint and were happier when the wasn't saying anything?

name: albatross
text: I had completely forgotten all of Ray's success could be laid at Lucifer's feet!

name: lizjones
text: Can Ray play the piano now that he has died and come back from hell?

name: petro
text: Why read "Faust" when one can just read Achewood instead? Though the boys could use one of those kegs that spouts any kind of booze.

name: saurkraus
text: Lucifer's handwriting seems perfect to me.

name: biddlebubbly
text: lucifer doesn't capitalize his name, what up with that

name: saurkraus
text: It makes it seem less intrusive, and more sly and insidious - just like Satan!

name: equinn2006
text: Can I just say that I love your avatar.

name: saurkraus
text: Yes. Yes you can.

name: zeal
text: He's very humble for the lord of hell.

name: atom
text: Thus begins my absolute favorite storyline.

name: gumfish
text: I like how Ray can't be bothered to read that tiny little contract. Is that optimistic or just lazy?

name: tekende
text: Ray thinks he is tricking the guy into giving him the piano without payment.

name: tetrisattack
text: Ray's signature looks a lot like a crappy version of the logo he made for Todd.

name: mercuri0us
text: I am totally going to sign my name like that from now on.

name: evolume
text: Lucifer sells pianos by cold calling. He is a salesman from the old school

name: epicurus
text: And notice how efficiently he went from an irate caller to closing the sale. A true master of his craft.

name: cousinted
text: I just know that Lucifer greeted Ray with: "Please allow me to introduce myself: I'm a man of wealth and taste"

name: ttagxamm
text: Though Ray seems almost as likely to start out a conversation that way.

name: honesttom
text: And Lucifer would smile slowly and say, "Well, what a coincidence..."

name: bjorntd
text: Please show me your Achewood fan fiction.

name: lux
text: Your avatar's eyebrow quirk coupled with your comment imply that this fanfic is NSFW.

name: bjorntd
text: Well, the only worthwhile fanfic is.

name: ninjaein
text: A comment left by ninjaein was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by envika, KaMeT, salo, TonyHighwind)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: hey man, in Ray's line of..well, not really 'work', per se but lifestyle, getting up on Ladies is priority numero one.

name: ninjaein
text: After reading the strips, so I've gathered.

name: deusoma
text: I'm not exactly sure why, but on this particular read-through, Lucifer's words were read in my mind by the G-Man from Half-Life.

name: hyetal
text: My greatest regret in life is never finishing Half-life.  Or rather, not having finished it before the backstory to HL2 spoiled the end of the original gem.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Makes sense that the devil is a telemarketer.

name: hurry
text: I like how Ray signs the contract in the exact same way he signs his emails in earlier strips; =Ray=

name: seanbateman
text: This strip completely changed Achewood.

name: cbtbone
text: The contract is not long.

name: troy_convers
text:
The devil went down to Achewood, he was looking for a soul to steal
He was in a bind 'cos he was way behind: he was willin' to make a deal...

name: mikeronomicon
text: Satan saves souls too, and redeems them for valuable merchandise.

name: hyetal
text: It seems that the Devil closes the door, and then Ray signs the contract and tosses it on the floor behind him. I don't do many deals with the Devil, but is it normal for the buyer to keep the only signed copy of a contract?

name: tonyhighwind
text: That copy of the contract is only meant for our realm of weak flesh.  A copy of it exists in triplicate in seventeen different nonconsecutive dimensions of accounting.

name: milo
text: looks like Satan really is a lawyer

name: milo
text: looks like Satan really is a lawyer

name: milo
text: damn my crappy mouse to HADES!!!!!

name: art-vader
text: Oh no! look out Ray. That gentleman probably doesn�t have your best interests in mind!!!
